name: JUICE PIT
description:
JUICE PIT is a bullet-hell game about putting juice ingredients into a pit.  That's it.

All art, music, sounds, and code were made solely by me within 5 days, with a few exceptions (some code was pasted from earlier projects).

I put in 30-40 hours of work on this.

Made for the Juicy Jam, hosted by AKking Studio.

Thank you for playing!
